note.p: Born William Pemberton; assumed the name Cludde on succeeding his uncle, Edward Cludde of Orleton, in 1785. Mayor of Shrewsbury, 1795; high sheriff of Shropshire, 1814. Owned the Shropshire manor of Wrockwardine from 1822. Married Anne Maria Jeffreys in 1781.
Burke’s landed gentry 1952, s.v. Herbert of Orleton
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 20 June 2019)
